title: Shopee Marketing Voucher Performance Daily Report
description: Daily report on the performance of a marketing voucher on Shopee

Voucher_Code.description: Unique code associated with the marketing voucher

Status.description: Current status of the voucher (e.g., Ongoing)

Period.description: Duration of the voucher validity period (start - end)

Claims.description: Number of claims made for the voucher

Orders.description: Number of orders placed using the voucher

Sales.description: Total Sales for the voucher Name

Cost.description: Total Cost for the voucher Name

Units_Sold.description: Total units sold using the voucher

Buyers.description: Number of unique buyers who used the voucher

Sales_Per_Buyer.description: Total Sales per Buyer for the voucher Name
